title: Building a Simple Chatbot with OpenAI Structured Outputs
title1: Building a Simple Chatbot with OpenAI Structured Outputs
title2: Building a Simple Chatbot with OpenAI Structured Outputs
description: Learn how to use OpenAI's new Structured Outputs feature to build a reliable flight search chatbot. This step-by-step tutorial covers function calling, response formatting, and monitoring with Helicone.
author: Lina Lam
